motd: This is an early [31mexperimental[0m version of WebTerminal v4, please, consider this when submitting !URL=https://github.com/intersystems-ru/webterminal/issues (bug reports). Check the development progress !URL=https://github.com/intersystems-ru/webterminal/issues/61 (here) or !URL=http://intersystems-ru.github.io/webterminal (read) more about WebTerminal.

changes: Terminal core is changed
Almost full application rewrite
New update system
Extended API: onTerminalInit and onUserInput functions support
COS read command incorrect behavior fix
Terminal client's API onUserInput solid performance
Terminal client's API extended with the print function
Caché 2013 compatibility fix
Temporary disabled autocomplete
Terminal API extend with the "execute" function
Security update, now updating over https
Caché 2013 output fix
Basic intelligent syntax highlighting for do, set, write and kill statements
Output algorithm optimization and fixes
Error highlight behavior change
Autocomplete for keywords, class names, class members, variables and variable members
Enhanced COS grammar
Enhanced grammar with read, znspace commands and post-conditions.
Enabled special commands: help & info
Empty line miss when scrolling starts fix
Redundant variable set after the error fix
Enhanced authorization algorithm, now terminal requires a key in a different request
Tab control escape sequences add
Grammar enhance for do statements
Command history related fixes
Grammar enhancements
Full VT-100 standard escape sequences support
WebTerminal API's onTerminalInit now fired after authorization success
Fixes to command history
Suggesting routine names in do statements
Grammar enhancements and method suggesting improvements
Terminal behavior is now configurable with [(special)m/config[0m special command
Server renaming feature add. Type [(special)m/config[0m [(variable)mserverName[0m = [(string)m"Local Server"[0m to set a browser's tab name.
Fix output for non-Chrome browsers
Fix update message clears the input
Cyrillic characters serialization fix
